name: 2 in 1: My Pet Hotel 2 + My Vet Practice: In the Country
synopsis: In the world of "My Vet Practice", you can build up your very own veterinary practice. You take tender loving care of your ill patients. Place your stethoscope around your neck and demonstrate your veterinary expertise in "My Vet Practice". In the world of "My Pet Hotel 2" you can turn your pet hotel into a palace! Organize an optimum care program for your large and small guests. Teach them all sorts of tricks and spoil them with tender loving care. Make your pet hotel world class!
